story: We met on a sunny day in Central Park, both reaching for the last coffee at the vendor stand. What started as a friendly conversation over shared coffee turned into countless adventures, late-night talks, and a love that grew stronger with each passing day. Now, we can't wait to celebrate our forever with the people who mean the most to us.

schedule.title: Ceremony
schedule.description: Join us as we exchange vows in an intimate outdoor ceremony surrounded by nature.

schedule.title: Cocktail Hour
schedule.description: Enjoy drinks, hors d'oeuvres, and mingling with friends and family.

schedule.title: Reception
schedule.description: Dinner, dancing, toasts, and celebration! Dinner will be served at 6:00 PM.

schedule.title: After Party
schedule.description: Keep the party going! Casual attire, dancing, and late-night snacks.

locations.name: Ceremony & Reception Venue
locations.parking: Free parking available on-site. Valet service also available.
locations.notes: The venue is wheelchair accessible. Please arrive 30 minutes early for ceremony seating.

accommodations.intro: We've reserved room blocks at the following hotels for your convenience. Please book by May 15th to receive the group rate.

hotels.name: Grand Hotel Downtown
hotels.notes: Use code WEDDING2026 for group rate: $159/night

hotels.name: Luxury Resort & Spa
hotels.notes: Pool and spa access. Group rate: $199/night

faq.question: What should I wear?
faq.answer: The dress code is semi-formal/cocktail attire. The ceremony will be outdoors, so please dress accordingly. Ladies, consider wearing block heels or wedges for the lawn.

faq.question: Can I bring a plus-one?
faq.answer: Due to venue capacity, we can only accommodate guests formally invited on your invitation. If you received a plus-one, it will be indicated on your invitation.

faq.question: Are children welcome?
faq.answer: We love your little ones, but we've decided to make this an adults-only celebration (18+) so everyone can relax and enjoy the evening. We appreciate your understanding!

faq.question: Will there be transportation provided?
faq.answer: We recommend using ride-share services or designated drivers. The venue has ample parking, but please drink responsibly!

faq.question: What time should I arrive?
faq.answer: Please arrive by 2:30 PM for the 3:00 PM ceremony. This will give you time to park, find your seat, and get settled before the ceremony begins.

faq.question: What if I have dietary restrictions?
faq.answer: Please let us know about any dietary restrictions or allergies when you RSVP. Our caterer can accommodate most dietary needs including vegetarian, vegan, gluten-free, and kosher options.

faq.question: Will the ceremony and reception be indoors or outdoors?
faq.answer: The ceremony will be outdoors in the garden, weather permitting. The reception will be indoors in the climate-controlled ballroom. We have a backup indoor location ready in case of inclement weather.

faq.question: Is there a wedding hashtag?
faq.answer: Yes! Please use #JaneAndJohnForever when posting photos on social media. We can't wait to see your pictures!
